name: Vessels 153: CHIEF SCIENTIST
description: It doesn’t take a lot of credentials and fancy qualifications to become a Chief Scientist of a gang of treasure-hunting grave robbers. Really, it’s just about knowing how to create a variety of useful explosives and having a willingness to dissect a broad range of lifeforms – often against their express wishes. An aptitude for recognising areas where one might be exposed to high levels of radiation and then making someone else go in first to check is not required, but may increase one’s longevity in the role significantly.
